name: uncanny
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
strange or mysterious, often in a way that is slightly frightening: It was uncanny the way that she always knew what he was thinking. She bears an uncanny resemblance to her father's best friend.
More examplesFewer examplesThe overall effect was weird and uncanny .All the clocks had stopped and the silence was uncanny .A continent apart, the four men displayed uncanny parallels.
